external_references.description: CISA. (2018, December 18). Analysis Report (AR18-352A) Quasar Open-Source Remote Administration Tool. Retrieved August 1, 2022.

description: [QuasarRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0262) can generate a UAC pop-up Window to prompt the target user to run a command as the administrator.(Citation: CISA AR18-352A Quasar RAT December 2018)
